title: How to Search Messages on WhatsApp

steps.title: Tap the WhatsApp app on your Home screen.
steps.content: Tap the WhatsApp app on your Home screen.

steps.title: Swipe down.
steps.content: Swipe down. This will reveal the Search bar. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Search bar.
steps.content: Tap the Search bar. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Type a search term.
steps.content: Type a search term. You can search for messages that were sent or contacts that you've chatted with. WhatsApp will search all of your conversations to find matches.

steps.title: Tap a conversation from the search results.
steps.content: Tap a conversation from the search results. This will open the conversation and highlight your search term in it. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the WhatsApp app.
steps.content: Tap the WhatsApp app. You can find this in your list of apps.

steps.title: Tap the Chats tab.
steps.content: Tap the Chats tab. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the magnifying glass button.
steps.content: Tap the magnifying glass button. This can be found at the top of the screen. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Type your search term.
steps.content: Type your search term. You can search for content inside of conversations, as well as contacts that you have chatted with. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the search result you want to open.
steps.content: Tap the search result you want to open. All of the results that match your query will be displayed. Tap one to open it with your search term highlighted.
